resources.string:
Welcome to Part-timer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Home:

 The Home page shows the check in and check out times when you enter and exit a location. You may edit these logs at any time. The Total number of hours worked on any given day and total estimated pay for the current week will be shown in the home page. 

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Stats: 

 The Stats page has a circular progress bar that shows the total hours completed during the current week. A bar chart just bellow that displays the hours worked each day of the week. You can switch to monthly stats option which shows the total number of hours worked during the current month.


 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

 Settings:

 In the settings page, you can set your work location. You can also switch between a 24 hour and 12 hour time format. You can enter your hourly rate of pay for your current part time job in order to allow us to display your weekly estimate pay displayed on the home page. You can contact us by clicking on the mail icon in the Settings page.
We love to get suggestions, email part.timer@helpdesk.com
